titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Thiacloprid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on [3-[(6-Chloro-3-pyridinyl)- methyl]-2-thiazolidinylidene]- cyanamide (Thiacloprid).
